Description: Ostracon, fragment (comprising two pieces now joined) of the body of a red-brown pottery jar, the fabric is grey in section, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and divided into bands by thin scored lines, with remains of one line of black-painted demotic text.
Curator's comments: From same pot as 1927,1011.190 Being studied for publication by Bryan Kraemer. Thoth 'Great of 5' Group
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393506) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393506)
